title: QuantityChangeDirectionEnum
description: Specifies whether a quantity change is an increase, a decrease or a replacement, whereby the quantity is always specified as a positive number.

oneOf.title: Decrease
oneOf.description: When the quantity should go down by the specified amount.

oneOf.title: Increase
oneOf.description: When the quantity should go up by the specified amount.

oneOf.title: Replace
oneOf.description: When the quantity should be replaced by the specified amount.
